description:
Pete and Gary explore the way soliders used humour to deal with the horrors of the First World War. In this episode they explore recruitment and conditions the soldiers experienced between 1914 and 1918.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki
